item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 24, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. AWS data center latencies, visualized (239 points | 100 comments)
2. Show HN: Wall-mounted diffusion mirror that turns reflections into paintings (323 points | 71 comments)
3. Show HN: RF Hunter – Find hidden cameras and other devices (177 points | 59 comments)
4. A field guide to the central, creeping section of the San Andreas Fault (2006) (5 points | discuss)
5. Pretty.c (140 points | 72 comments)
6. Playstation Vita Architecture (Part 1) (198 points | 64 comments)
7. What happens when you make a move in lichess.org? (266 points | 114 comments)
8. NetGuard – rootless Android outbound per-app OSS firewall, like LittleSnitch (108 points | 61 comments)
9. Show HN: Open-source low-code email editor (114 points | 19 comments)
10. Fearless SSH: Short-lived certificates bring Zero Trust to infrastructure (108 points | 92 comments)
11. Probably pay attention to tokenizers (237 points | 72 comments)
12. My NumPy year: Creating a DType for the next generation of scientific computing (63 points | 4 comments)
13. The Anvil Text Editor (14 points | 3 comments)
14. Launch HN: GPT Driver (YC S21) – End-to-end app testing in natural language (103 points | 77 comments)
15. Ask HN: Website with 6^16 subpages and 80k+ daily bots (94 points | 81 comments)
16. A DSL for peephole transformation rules of integer operations in the PyPy JIT (94 points | 8 comments)
17. Irreproducible Results (2011) (39 points | 18 comments)
18. The Tragedy of Google Books (2017) (415 points | 162 comments)
19. Reinforcement Learning: An Introduction (2018) (84 points | 16 comments)
20. What Color is Your Function? (2015) (5 points | discuss)
21. Parks on the Air (95 points | 49 comments)
22. Implementing attributes for plain text using subranges like Emacs (9 points | discuss)
23. Show HN: Microsoft Teams Ticketing System – Ticketing as a Service (16 points | 23 comments)
24. Seeing faces in things: A model and dataset for pareidolia (53 points | 7 comments)
25. Postbox has been acquired by eM Client (67 points | 25 comments)
26. Show HN: I built a task manager that separates "do" and "due" dates (122 points | 60 comments)
27. OOP is not that bad (104 points | 205 comments)
28. Netflix Shuts Down Its AAA Game Studio (18 points | 14 comments)
29. The Incredible Machine (1968) [video] (77 points | 36 comments)
30. Goldman and Apple 'illegally sidestepped' obligations to credit-card customers (261 points | 158 comments)
